tool_description: The largest flight accident database API. Retrieve detailed aviation incident data from the NTSB database for enhanced safety and research initiatives.
name: Flight Accidents API (NTSB)
title: Flight Accidents API (NTSB)

api_list.name: /all
api_list.description: Get all the flight accidents / incidents from 1948-2022.

optional_parameters.name: pagesize
optional_parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include
